text: Zamagipintira korana eri netre'na, zamave kampima nago'manetoa zantmima rusima huno'ma me'neana eritregahue. Ana hanuge'za osi'ama mani'naza Filistia naga'mo'za Juda vahe kna hu'za agru hu'neza Anumzamo'na monora hunantegahaze. Ko'ma Jebusi vahe'mo'zama hu'nazaza hu'za Ekronima nemaniza Filistia naga'mo'za nagri vahe'ene eme hagerafiza manigahaze.
